description: Number of incongruent integer-sided triangles with sides a,b,c, a<b<c, a+b+c=n.
references: A. M. Yaglom and I. M. Yaglom: Challenging Mathematical Problems with Elementary Solutions. Vol. I. Combinatorial Analysis and Probability Theory. New York: Dover Publications, Inc., 1987, p. 8, #30 (First published: San Francisco: Holden-Day, Inc., 1964)
extensions: Apparently an erroneous version of A005044. For example a(18) should be 3 not 2.
